content: Even the hardest cravings will go away in just a few minutes! Listen to your favourite song and feel it pass!
Drink a glass of water. Notice how the water feels in your mouth. Then notice the water as it passes down your throat ...Youâ€™ve distracted yourself!
As every nicotine-free minute passes, your body becomes more and more used to life without nicotine. Go five minutes further now!
Set yourself a small target. Try to get through the next hour without vaping. Then the next hour. Little by little, step by step, you will achieve your goals!
Stay strong! ðŸ’ªThis craving will pass in just a few minutes
Try something else: chew some gum and distract yourself!
Stay nicotine-free - you can do it! We believe in you
Try keeping your hands busy. Play a game on your phone or try out a fidget spinner!
Thousands of people have successfully remained nicotine-free using Quit Genius. You can be one of them too!
Find a symbol of your nicotine-free status. Hold on to it and have it with you wherever you go.
Youâ€™ve made a promise to yourself to become a non-vaper. Keep to that promise!
Repeat to yourself: "Cravings are normal. But I am going to stay strong. I can do this. I know this will be worth it!"
2 months from now, you will thank yourself for resisting this moment!
Tell someone about your day. If no oneâ€™s around, recount it to yourself. Youâ€™re now five minutes further into being a non-vaper.
Think big - by not vaping now, you are making your life better, for good. A small price to pay for such a great reward!
A change of scenery can work miracles. Get up and go somewhere else - another room works well too.
Thereâ€™s light at the end of the tunnel! Look forward to a healthier, happier you!
Go for a short run or for a walk - exercise will get your blood pumping, make you feel alive and help beat the craving.
By not vaping now, youâ€™re another step closer to beating those nicotine monsters!
A short walk outside cuts cravings and makes your brain produce endorphins - happy hormones. Beating cravings makes you fitter and happier!
If you donâ€™t feed your nicotine monsters, theyâ€™ll die and so will your cravings! Stay strong and say goodbye to them!
Close your eyes. Take a deep breath in and out and repeat...And now relax!
What would your nicotine-free life look like? Close your eyes and imagine! Itâ€™s worth resisting this craving, isnâ€™t it?
Try out the coping exercises below - they are awesome!
Look back to your reasons to quit vaping and remind yourself why you are doing this!
Stop what youâ€™re doing right now and do something else. This helps your brain refocus making it easier to beat a craving.
Close your eyes and imagine a life without nicotine...the healthier you would be...the amount of money you would save...itâ€™s worth it!
Think about all the money you have saved by not vaping...now think about all the awesome things you can do with that money!
Resisting a craving may not feel good in the moment, but it will feel oh so good when it passes!
If you miss holding an e-cigarette in your hand, try to hold something else - a pencil, a paper clip, a coin will do!
This craving will pass in a few minutes. The damage to your body is longer lasting. Get past these few minutes and step closer to better health!
If you miss the feeling of an e-cigarette in your mouth, try a replacement. Try a toothpick, a straw, or even celery sticks!
By not vaping, youâ€™re keeping your body nicotine-free and fresh!
Just focus on today. Thatâ€™s where you can make a difference. You can think about the future later. Stay strong!
By not vaping right now, youâ€™re getting closer to a nicotine-free life!
Most cravings donâ€™t last long. Wait for one minute. You can watch the hands of the clock as they move.
Quitting will allow your taste to return to normal so you can appreciate your favourite meal even more!
It can be overwhelming to think you'll never vape again, so don't.
Not vaping now will put you on a path to become fitter, stronger and healthier!
Don't focus on forever, focus on the day you have in front of you. This is where your power is. We believe in you!
Being nicotine-free will allow you to take back control of your life!
Count down from 100 in sevens. Start now - 100. 93. 86. Your turn.
What would your future self tell your present self?
Look around you and name 5 things you can see. Write them down on your phone. Your craving will have passed!
Remember your mantra and say it back to yourself. Youâ€™ve got this!
Name 4 things around you that you can touch. Write them down and by the time you have done that your craving would be long gone!
Remember cravings only last 3 minutes. You can outlast them - donâ€™t let your guard down, youâ€™ve made so much progress!
